alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:31PM EDT until August 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Spalding County in west central Georgia... Fayette County in north central Georgia... Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Western Pike County in west central Georgia... Troup County in west central Georgia... Eastern Coweta County in west central Georgia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 531 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Palmetto to near Moreland to Standing Rock, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Fayetteville, Greenville, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Palmetto, West Point, Senoia, Hogansville, Grantville, Woodbury, Luthersville, Brooks, Moreland, Molena, Williamson, Sharpsburg, Turin, and Haralson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Coweta; Fayette; Meriwether; Pike; Spalding; Troup
